GSD.description:
media: atomisp: fix dummy_ptr check to avoid duplicate active_bo

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 2a4be3f39f1c436f2f59902247a90d705fe76e2d. For more details please see the references link.
